message: I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid I'm not quite comfortable with $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $100 to make it worth my while.
I'm still interested in the product, but $100 is a bit higher than I'd like to pay. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go below $105. I think it's a fair price considering the value you'll get from the product.
I'm still not convinced that $105 is the best price for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I can only go up to $98. Can you consider that?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $110. I think it's a fair price considering the value you'll get from the product. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm starting to think it's time to explore other options...
